cast.name: 布莱特·迈可斯 Bret Michaels

introduction: 全球当红饶舌和摇滚歌星肩负担当花花公子摄影师的艰巨任务。记录了Ja Rule，DMX，Xzibit，Nelly以及Tommy Lee等人为世界上最美丽的女人们摄影的细致过程。The hottest rappers and the hardest rockers take on the extremely enviable task of becoming Playboy photographers! Join top-selling hip-hop bad boys Ja Rule, DMX, Xzibit and Nelly, along with rock idols Tommy Lee, Korn's Jonathan Davis, Disturbed's David Draiman and Poison's Bret Michaels as they snap the **iest shots of some of the world's most beautiful women.You'll get exclusive access to the Playboy photo studio with the stars as they party to the beat of their own music with their favourite Playmates and Special Editions models. Hosted by Miss January 2002, Nicole Narain, and starring Playmates Christi Shake and Michele Rogers, along with Cyber Girls Gina Patrone, Heather McQuaid and adult star Deven Davis (the real life wife of Korn's Jonathan Davis), 'Hip Hop And Rock' provides a unique insider's look at the workings of a Playboy photo shoot. Accompanied by a blasting soundtrack featuring original songs by Ja Rule, DMX, Xzibit, Tommy Lee, Korn and Disturbed, this is a music video unlike any other!
